__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''Firefox'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your '''Launchpad Id''' in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged. 

=== Tools ===

For doing your work easier during the hug days remember to use the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuBugDay/Tools|hugday-tools]]</nowiki>.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===

To sign up for 5-A-Day participation, please add your Launchpad ID to the Participants column. (This is not the email address you used for signing up for LP, but the last part of the URL that https://launchpad.net/people/+me redirects you to (everything behind the ~ sign)):

1. Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
2. Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID. 

Also sign up here: https://launchpad.net/~5-a-day-participants/+join

=== Triage Process ===

The <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam|Mozilla Team]]</nowiki> has a NEW/Incomplete processing described at their <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam/Bugs/TriagersHandbook|Triagers Handbook]]</nowiki>, Please read that information before starting to doing some triage.
 
=== Stock Responses ===

Firefox 3 stock response for collecting more information:

<pre>
Thanks for taking the time to report this bug and helping to make Ubuntu better. Could you please add more information for it by looking to https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MozillaTeam/Bugs , Thanks in advance.
</pre>

For general stock responses please see <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Responses|Bugs/Responses]]</nowiki>.
